snippet.title: Son of a Gun | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Lock and load!🔥  
Son of a Gun is an action-packed top-down shooter filled with bullets, blood, and explosions! 💥

Coming October 22 to Steam & GOG. 
Switch players – you’re up early on October 11! 🎮

#SonOfAGun #TopDownShooter #NintendoSwitch #Steam #GOG #BulletHell

Follow us:
https://twitter.com/UntoldTalesHQ
https://www.facebook.com/untoldtalesgames
https://www.instagram.com/untoldtaleshq/
https://www.tiktok.com/@untoldtales.games
